ccg-setinfo.name: Allegiance
ccg-setinfo.game: Star Trek Collectible Card Game: Second Edition

card.name: Virtual Reality Headset
card.text: Order - If you do not command a Dissident personnel, choose one: stop two {car} personnel present to place a non- {TN} {dom} personnel from hand at your Mouth of the Wormhole; or stop two {dom} personnel present to place a non - {TN} {car} personnel from hand at your Mouth of the Wormhole. That personnel is stopped. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Firestorm
card.text: Decay: 2. (When there are two cards on this event, destroy it.) Plays in your core. At the end of your turn, place a card from your hand on this event and for each headquarters mission each player commands, he or she chooses two non-Decay events he or she commands and the owners of those events shuffles them into his or her deck.

card.name: Helping Hand
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma or are involved in an engagement, you may discard a ship that is the same class as the ship he or she is aboard from hand to make it Weapons +4 and Shields +4 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Reman Assault Team
card.text: Plays on your ship. When your Reman aboard this ship is killed by a dilemma, you may place a Reman in your hand aboard this ship. (That personnel joins the mission attempt.)

card.name: Under Siege
card.text: Assault. Maneuver. Plays in your opponent's core. (He or she commands this event.) When a player loses command of this event, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Conflict
card.text: When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, discard 5 cards from hand or lose 5 points to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

card.name: Forcing Their Way
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must not command U.S.S. Voyager. Order - Discard a Nucleogenic card from hand to place a {Voy} Treachery personnel aboard your U.S.S. Equinox.

card.name: Genetronic Treatment
card.text: When one of your personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, if he or she is present with a Medical personnel, stop that personnel instead. Then you may discard the top card of your deck to shuffle this interrupt into your deck.

card.name: Interspatial Fissures
card.text: Nucleogenic. While your personnel present with three {Voy} Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make that personnel gain a skill from a Treachery personnel present until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Relentless Attacks
card.text: Nucleogenic. While your personnel present with three {Voy} Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make that personnel attributes +3 until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Team of Infiltrators
card.text: Infiltration. When your Infiltrator is facing a dilemma, if he or she is present with two Infiltrators, meet Integrity and Strength requirements of that dilemma using Cunning instead.

card.name: The Central Command
card.text: When any number of your {car} Officer and/or {car} Treachery personnel are about to be stopped by a dilemma, discard the top three cards of your deck to prevent that.

card.name: Locate Fuel Source
card.text: Anthropology, Exobiology, Science, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>38 When your personnel complete this mission, each player may shuffle each Nucleogenic card in his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

card.name: Li Nalas (Vastly Outnumbered)
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}2 Honor {SD}Leadership {SD}Security While an opponent commands an Assault event, this personnel and each {DS9} personnel present is Strength +1.

card.name: Odo (Vastly Outnumbered)
card.text: {SD}Honor {SD}Law {SD}Programming {SD}Security Shape-shifter. While an opponent commands an Assault event, this personnel cannot be killed or stopped by dual dilemmas.

card.name: Angelo Tassoni
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Navigation {SD}Security {SD}Treachery When you play this personnel you may choose one: take a Nucleogenic card from your discard pile into hand; or place a Nucleogenic card you own that has been removed from the game on top of your deck.

card.name: Benjamin Sisko (Vastly Outnumbered)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation When this personnel begins a mission attempt, if an opponent commands a Maneuver event, you may name a dilemma. This personnel gains This personnel and each {DS9} personnel present cannot be killed or stopped by that dilemma until the end of turn.

card.name: Equinox Doctor (Unethical Medical Hologram)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}2 Exobiology {SD}Medical {SD}2 Treachery Infiltrator. When you are about to lose command of your {Voy} Treachery personnel present, you may lose 5 points to prevent that.

card.name: Hikaru Sulu (Experienced Helmsman)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Biology {SD}2 Navigation {SD}Officer You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, you may place your {TOS} ship at your mission.

card.name: Ilia (Finest Navigator in Starfleet)
card.text: {SD}Honor {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Telepathy You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore her next ability. When you play this personnel, if you command a {TOS} personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, for each headquarters mission your opponent commands, you may shuffle two cards from your discard pile into your deck.

card.name: James T. Kirk (Experienced Commander)
card.text: {SD}Honor {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Programming Admiral. Commander: U.S.S. Enterprise. You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, he gains This personnel and each {TOS} personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more may be excluded from random selections until the end of this turn.

card.name: Julian Bashir (Vastly Outnumbered)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Exobiology {SD}Medical {SD}Science Genetically Enhanced. When a dilemma that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill is about to kill your {DS9} personnel present, if an opponent commands an Assault event, you may discard a card from hand to prevent that.

card.name: Leonard H. McCoy (Experienced Advisor)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Exobiology {SD}Honor {SD}Medical You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, the next {TOS} personnel you play this turn is cost -3.

card.name: Marla Gilmore (Conflicted Engineer)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Programming {SD}Transporters {SD}Treachery While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Treachery, you may lose 5 points to exclude her and each {Voy} Treachery personnel present from being randomly selected by that dilemma.

card.name: Maxwell Burke (Arrogant First Officer)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}2 Programming {SD}Security {SD}Treachery Commander: U.S.S. Equinox. Order - Discard two cards from hand to choose one: download a Nucleogenic card; or take a Nucleogenic card from your discard pile and place it on top of your deck.

card.name: Miles O'Brien (Vastly Outnumbered)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Honor {SD}Transporters While an opponent commands a Maneuver event, the ship this personnel is aboard is Shields +4.

card.name: Montgomery Scott (Experienced Engineer)
card.text: {SD}2 Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}2 Transporters You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, if you command another {TOS} personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, you may remove an event in an opponent's core from the game.

card.name: Noah Lessing (Driven Officer)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Geology {SD}Programming {SD}Science {SD}Treachery While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to have him gain a skill required by that dilemma until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Rudolph Ransom (Devious Captain)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Exobiology {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Science {SD}Transporters {SD}Treachery Commander: U.S.S. Equinox. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may lose 5 points and choose two of your stopped {Voy} Treachery personnel present and stop this personnel to unstop those two personnel. Those personnel join this mission attempt.

card.name: Spock (Experienced Officer)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Archaeology {SD}Engineer {SD}Programming {SD}Science You may play this personnel at cost -1 to ignore his next ability. You may play this personnel aboard your {TOS} ship that has a {TOS} personnel who has a cost of 4 or more aboard.

card.name: Thompson
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Archaeology {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Medical {SD}Physics {SD}Science {SD}Treachery When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to make his cost -3.

card.name: Willard Decker (Recommended Replacement)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Programming {SD}Science {SD}Security Commander: U.S.S. Enterprise. You may play this personnel at cost -1 to ignore his ability until the end of this turn. When you play this personnel, return your {TOS} personnel who has a cost of 4 or more to his or her owner's hand.

card.name: Grish
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Medical {SD}Transporters {SD}Treachery Thief. When your {fer} personnel present is killed by a dilemma, this personnel and each {Pa} {fer} personnel present cannot be killed by dilemmas until the end of this turn.

card.name: Krem (Unidentified Pirate)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Geology {SD}Honor {SD}Navigation {SD}Science Commander: Quetsivoo. Thief. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, if he is present with two {Pa} {fer} personnel, you may unstop all your stopped {fer} personnel at this mission.

card.name: Muk (Unidentified Pirate)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Archaeology {SD}2 Physics {SD}Security {SD}Treachery Thief. When you play this personnel, if you command three {Pa} {fer} personnel, you may download up to three equipment.

card.name: Quark (Vastly Outnumbered)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Anthropology {SD}Treachery When you play this personnel, you may download a card and place that card beneath your Ferenginar. When you play this personnel, if an opponent commands a Maneuver event, he is cost -2.

card.name: Ulis (Unidentified Pirate)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Biology {SD}Engineer {SD}Programming {SD}Treachery Commander: Quetsivoo. Thief. When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may stop him to take a {Pa} {fer} personnel from your discard pile and place him or her present with this personnel. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

card.name: Elder T'Pol (Displaced Survivor)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Honor {SD}2 Science When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may shuffle each non-Human {sf} personnel that you own that has been removed from the game into his or her owner's deck.

card.name: Greer
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Biology {SD}Honor {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer When this personnel is about to be removed from the game, if he is present with three non-Human {sf} personnel, you may download an interrupt.

card.name: Karyn Archer (Displaced Descendant)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Honor {SD}Leadership {SD}Programming {SD}Science {SD}Security When this personnel is removed from the game, each of your {sf} personnel are attributes +2 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Lorian (Displaced Descendant)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Science {SD}Security {SD}Transporters Commander: Future Enterprise.When this personnel is about to be removed from the game, you may unstop each stopped {sf} personnel present. (Those personnel may join the mission attempt.)

card.name: U.S.S. Enterprise (Where She Belongs)
card.text: You may play this ship at cost -4 to ignore its next ability. When you play this ship, you may download a {TOS} personnel who has a cost of 4 or more and play him or her at cost -4 aboard this ship.

card.name: U.S.S. Equinox (Determined To Get Home)
card.text: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at Caretaker's Array. While this ship is at a {DQ} mission, you may play {Voy} Treachery personnel, {na} personnel, and equipment aboard this ship. While you do not command U.S.S. Voyager, you may pay the cost of losing 5 points to use an ability on one of your {Voy} personnel by discarding a Nucleogenic card from hand.

card.name: Quetsivoo (Unidentified Pirate Ship)
card.text: While you command three {Pa} {fer} personnel aboard this ship, it is attributes +4 and each of your {fer} personnel aboard this ship gains {Pa}.

card.name: Future Enterprise (Displaced Starship)
card.text: When your non-Human {sf} personnel at this mission is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma, you may remove that personnel from the game instead.
